verses.verse: There was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> the face <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and for his <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> because he put to <S%H4191>death<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1393>them<s%> (now the Gibeonites were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H7586>them:<s%> and Saul <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>kill<s%> them in his <S%H7065>zeal<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>);

and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1393>Gibeonites,<s%> "What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H3722>you?<s%> And with what shall I make atonement, that you may <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"

The <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5973>him,<s%> "It is no matter of <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> between us and <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> or his <S%H1004>house;<s%> neither is it for us to put any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Whatever you <S%H559>say,<s%> that will I do for <S%H6213>you.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "The <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H1819>us,<s%> and who devised against <S%H8045>us,<s%> that we should be destroyed from <S%H3320>remaining<s%> in any of the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to <S%H3363>us,<s%> and we will hang them up to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> the <S%H972>chosen<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will give <S%H5414>them.<s%>"

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2550>spared<s%> <S%H4648>Mephibosheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> because of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H7621>oath<s%> that was between <S%H1732>them,<s%> between David and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah,<s%> whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H764>Armoni<s%> and <S%H4648>Mephibosheth;<s%> and the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5741>Adriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H4259>Meholathite.<s%>

He <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1393>Gibeonites,<s%> and they <S%H3363>hanged<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all <S%H7651>seven<s%> of them <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> They were put to <S%H4191>death<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8462>days,<s%> at the beginning of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

<S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H5186>spread<s%> it for her on the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> from the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> until <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H5413>poured<s%> on them from the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> She <S%H5414>allowed<s%> neither the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> on them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> nor the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
It was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> what <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah,<s%> the <S%H6370>concubine<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead,<s%> who had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them from the <S%H7339>street<s%> of Beth <S%H1052>Shan,<s%> where the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H8511>hanged<s%> <S%H3117>them,<s%> in the day that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa;<s%>

and he brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from there the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son:<s%> and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of those who were <S%H3363>hanged.<s%>

They <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H6762>Zela,<s%> in the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and they <S%H6213>performed<s%> all that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> for the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H4421>war<s%> again with <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3381>down,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> with <S%H3898>him,<s%> and fought against the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> grew <S%H5774>faint;<s%>

and <S%H3430>Ishbibenob,<s%> who was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of whose <S%H7013>spear<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H4948>weight,<s%> he being <S%H2296>armed<s%> with a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H559>sword,<s%> thought to have <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

But <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H582>him.<s%> Then the men of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "You shall <S%H3318>go<s%> no more out with us to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that you <S%H3518>don't<s%> quench the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

It came to pass after <S%H310>this,<s%> that there was again <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> at <S%H1359>Gob:<s%> then <S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H5593>Saph,<s%> who was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant.<s%>

There was again <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> at <S%H1359>Gob;<s%> and <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3296>Jaareoregim<s%> the <S%H1022>Bethlehemite<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>'s <S%H6086>brother,<s%> the staff of whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>beam.<s%>

There was again <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> where there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4067>stature,<s%> who had on every <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>fingers,<s%> and on every <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>toes,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> in <S%H4557>number;<s%> and he also was <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant.<s%>
When he <S%H2778>defied<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimei,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> killed <S%H5221>him.<s%>

These <S%H702>four<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath;<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
